translations: v.触诊（身体某部分）（palpate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Locate the femoral vein by palpating the femoral artery.
sentences.translation: 股静脉就在股动脉的内侧(大概1cm左右。)

sentences.sentence: This abnormality can be appreciated by carefully palpating the pulse in such patients.
sentences.translation: 当小心地触诊这类病人的脉搏时，可以辨别出这种异常。

sentences.sentence: A way of get - ting a diagnostic impression of the disease by palpating the body surface of the patient with the hand.
sentences.translation: 用手对病人体表进行触摸按压，以获得诊断印象的一种诊察方法。
